workflow.name: Create new wordpress posts with a featured Image with Airtable
workflow.description:
This workflow is aimed to create new posts in wordpress automatically from an airtable dashboard.
When creating content in bulk, we can save time by automating how we can post and publish this content.

## Usage
1. Get the content from Airtable. Since we have this as a markdown, we will have to convert it to a html format to make it easier to publish and manage on WordPress
2. Upload the blog post with the content, title and all other relevant information needed for an optimized blog
3. Once the post is posted, we need to upload the image and set it as a features image for the blogs

Happy productivity

parameters.content:
## Automating Posting content to WordPress and setting up the featured Image
This workflow aims to simplify the process by which we share content on Wordpress sites with n8n from airtable

### Usage
1. Get the content from AirTable. SInce we have this as a markdown, we will have to convert it to a html format to make it easier to publish and manage on WordPress
2. Upload the blog post with the content, title and all other relevant information needed for an optimized blog
3. Once the post is posted, we need to upload the image and set it as a features image for the blogs

## SETUP
1. Create a wordpress application and set up the password

2. Have an airtable with the columns 
Keyword | Title | Blog content

3. The blog content in this canse is a markdown format generated by AI

data.details: The Filter node can be used to filter items based on a condition. If the condition is met, the item will be passed on to the next node. If the condition is not met, the item will be omitted. Conditions can be combined together by AND(meet all conditions), or OR(meet at least one condition).
